ModMetaData.name: Diplomatic Marriage +
ModMetaData.author: Ionfrigate12345
ModMetaData.description:
This mod, also known as Diplomatic Marriage Plus or DMP, is heavily inspired by the famous Paradox game - Crusader Kings. It's also inspired by the Diplomatic Marriage event in the mod More Faction Interactions as a starting point, which is also why I call this mod Diplomatic Marriage "Plus". 
Features: 
You can now form a permanent alliance by marrying a child of your colony leader to an important person of one of your ally, making the latter your in-laws family, providing you more help without worrying about goodwill decay. But in return you need to protect the key couple from all random dangers to keep the alliance active (any death will result in immediate breakup, just like how it works in CK). 
Since the key couple is considered as World Pawns of that NPC faction, not only events from this mod, but all mods spawning NPC pawns (Factional War for example) or even Vanilla may randomly spawn them on your map. So the challenge always exists. Do not take it for granted, it will not be so easy to protect NPC not under your control!
